newsitem.title: USA: Avant! Corp says in $7 mln, $5 mln deals.
newsitem.headline: Avant! Corp says in $7 mln, $5 mln deals.

text.p: Avant! Corp said Monday it had signed a contract worth more than $7 million with a U.S.-based semiconductor company and had received an order worth more than $5 million from an electronics company.
Avant! did not disclose the names of the two companies.
It said its contract with the semiconductor company was for its integrated circuit design automation tools. It said the company is a long-time user of Avant! tools.
It said its three-year agreement with the electronics company is for its circuit design automation tools.
